ComicInfo.Summary:
Angelica attempts to keep Jake and Vera safe from Tor's men by finding a spot for them to hide out. But when Vera spills the beans on the sadistic truth behind Tor's actions, Angelica decides she can't turn a blind eye and must go above and beyond her duties as a bodyguard.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Edgar Salazar & Ivan Nunes | 1 | B | Cover B | Riveiro & Grostieta | 2 | C | Cover C | Anthony Spay & David Ocampo | 3 | D | Cover D | Canaan White & Hedwin Zaldivar | 4 | E | Licensing Expo Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 250 | Keith Garvey | Missing | F | Licensing Expo Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 100 | Keith Garvey | Missing |
